wikipedia_page.main: George Lyons (born April 1884) was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Salford, Lancashire. He played for Black Lane Temperance, Oldham Athletic, and Manchester United.

response: *George Lyons (theologian) (born 1947), American author and professor of New Testament studies
*George Lyons (born Dominick George Martoccio; 1889–1958), American musician, harpist and composer, part of Lyons and Yosco
